body:
so the original goal is to reuse VariableSavable for both tree variable and also fertile stats. which is another resources required for training.  https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22418/files#diff-56893bd7583ce1f57ff27e7ebc64ea73R93 

Given the context, what would recommend here?
